points.title: Terms may be changed at any time without advance notice

tosdr.tldr: The service can change the terms of service at any time, even without notification to the user. New or updated terms are posted on their site but your continued use of the service is taken as acceptance of the new or changed terms.

topics.description: Services need to evolve. But it is important that updating the service does not break the consentment with the user. Updates and changes to terms of service and privacy policy need to be properly noticed to users and to sollicit their agreement again.
topics.name: Notice of Changing Terms
topics.subtitle: Are users notified when terms change? Are they given enough time to find out what changed and discuss this with each other before deciding whether to continue to use the service under the new terms?
topics.title: Notice of Changing Terms

points.title: No promise to inform you about data requests from governments

tosdr.tldr: The service has made no promise to inform users a government request for their data has been made. As it's unlikely you'd know about the request, you'd have no real opportunity to object to the request being made or carried out.

topics.name: Law and government requests
topics.subtitle: How do services deal with government requests?
topics.title: Law and government requests

points.title: No transparency on law enforcement requests

tosdr.tldr: The service is not making clear to their users what standards and rules law enforcement must follow when they seek access to sensitive user data.

topics.name: Law and government requests
topics.subtitle: How do services deal with government requests?
topics.title: Law and government requests
